projectCategory: ICSE Class IX Java Project Work (BlueJ)
subject: Java Programming

projects.title: Print First N Natural Numbers
projects.description: Write a program to print the first N natural numbers using a for loop.
projects.answer: The numbers from 1 to N are printed sequentially using a loop.
projects.learningOutcome: Understand basic loop syntax and execution flow.

projects.title: Sum of First N Natural Numbers
projects.description: Accept a number N and calculate the sum of numbers from 1 to N.
projects.answer: The sum of the first N natural numbers is calculated correctly.
projects.learningOutcome: Learn how accumulation works inside loops.

projects.title: Multiplication Table Generator
projects.description: Generate the multiplication table of a given number up to 10.
projects.answer: The multiplication table of the given number from 1 to 10 is displayed.
projects.learningOutcome: Apply loop repetition to real-life problems.

projects.title: Count Digits of a Number
projects.description: Count the number of digits in a given integer.
projects.answer: The total number of digits in the given number is determined.
projects.learningOutcome: Understand how numbers are processed digit by digit.

projects.title: Sum of Digits of a Number
projects.description: Find the sum of digits of a given number.
projects.answer: All digits of the number are added to obtain the final sum.

projects.title: Reverse a Number
projects.description: Reverse the digits of a given number using a for loop.
projects.answer: The digits of the number are reversed successfully.
projects.learningOutcome: Strengthen loop logic and digit manipulation.

projects.title: Palindrome Number Checker
projects.description: Check whether a given number is a palindrome.
projects.answer: The number is checked and correctly identified as palindrome or not.

projects.title: Factorial Calculator
projects.description: Calculate the factorial of a number using a for loop.
projects.answer: The factorial of the given number is calculated correctly.

projects.title: Count Factors of a Number
projects.description: Count how many factors a given number has.
projects.answer: The total number of factors of the number is found.

projects.title: Prime Number Checker
projects.description: Check whether a number is prime.
projects.answer: The number is checked and identified as prime or composite.

projects.title: Armstrong Number Checker
projects.description: Check whether a number is an Armstrong number.

projects.title: Perfect Number Checker
projects.description: Check whether a number is a perfect number.

projects.title: Even and Odd Number Counter
projects.description: Count how many even and odd numbers exist between 1 and N.

projects.title: Common Logical Errors Demonstration
projects.description: Demonstrate common logical errors in for loops and correct them.

projects.title: Loop Flow Visualizer (Dry Run Table)
projects.description: Create a program that prints iteration values to visualize loop flow.

projects.title: Print Even Numbers up to N
projects.description: Print all even numbers from 1 to N using a for loop.

projects.title: Print Odd Numbers up to N
projects.description: Print all odd numbers from 1 to N.

projects.title: Sum of Even Numbers up to N
projects.description: Calculate the sum of all even numbers between 1 and N.

projects.title: Sum of Odd Numbers up to N
projects.description: Calculate the sum of all odd numbers between 1 and N.

projects.title: Print Squares of Numbers
projects.description: Print square of numbers from 1 to N.

projects.title: Print Cubes of Numbers
projects.description: Print cube of numbers from 1 to N.

projects.title: Check Strong Number
projects.description: Check whether a number is a Strong number.
projects.learningOutcome: Combine digit processing with factorial logic.

projects.title: Print Factors of a Number
projects.description: Print all factors of a given number.

projects.title: Check Composite Number
projects.description: Check whether a number is composite.
projects.learningOutcome: Differentiate between prime and composite numbers.

projects.title: Generate Fibonacci Series (N terms)
projects.description: Generate Fibonacci series up to N terms.

projects.title: Find Greatest Digit in a Number
projects.description: Find the greatest digit in a given number.

projects.title: Find Smallest Digit in a Number
projects.description: Find the smallest digit in a given number.

projects.title: Count Prime Numbers between 1 and N
projects.description: Count how many prime numbers exist between 1 and N.

projects.title: Check Duck Number
projects.description: Check whether a number is a Duck number.

projects.title: Loop Execution Counter
projects.description: Count how many times a loop executes.
